con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars/> <resources base="http://localhost:8181/cxf/volley"> <resource path="/catalog"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="204"/> </method> <resource path="/{name}"> <param name="name" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="DELETE"> <request/> <response status="204"/> </method> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="PUT"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="204"/> </method> </resource> <resource path="/{name}/colors"> <param name="name" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/accounts"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="204"/> </method> <resource path="/{login}"> <param name="login" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="DELETE"> <request/> <response status="204"/> </method> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="PUT"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="204"/> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/orders"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/account/{customerId}"> <param name="customerId" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/order/{orderRef}"> <param name="orderRef" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/{orderRef}/{status}"> <param name="orderRef" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <param name="status" style="template" type="xs:string"> <option value="Order paid"/> <option value="Order in preparation"/> <option value="Order shipped"/> <option value="Under delivery"/> <option value="Order delivered"/> <option value="Order canceled"/> <option value="Delivery exception"/> </param> <method name="PUT"> <request/> <response status="204"/> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/basket"> <resource path="/{login}"> <param name="login" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="204"/> </method> <method name="PUT"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response status="204"/> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/payments"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/account/{accountId}"> <param name="accountId" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/payment/{paymentId}"> <param name="paymentId" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/{accountId}"> <param name="accountId" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="*/*"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>
